languages.text:
Свернув за поворот, я торжествующе понимаю, что загнал Жертву в тупик. Время расправы!
Яд, полученный мной от Просительницы в оплату этой охоты и заключенный в кристаллических снарядах, уже должен был подействовать. Замедлить нервную систему моей добычи, вызвать атрофию мышц, погасить сознание.

As I turn the corner, I triumphantly realise that I have driven the Prey into a dead end. It is time for the massacre!
The poison I received from the Petitioner as payment for the hunt is contained in the crystalline projectiles and should have worked by now. It will slow down the nervous system of my Prey, weaken its muscles, and render it unconscious.
languages.original_text:
Свернув за поворот, я торжествующе понимаю, что загнал Жертву в тупик. Время расправы!
Яд, полученный мной от Просительницы в оплату этой охоты и заключенный в кристаллических снарядах, уже должен был подействовать. Замедлить нервную систему моей добычи, вызвать атрофию мышц, погасить сознание.

The poison I had received from the Petitioner as payment for the hunt was contained in the crystalline projectiles and should have worked by now. It would slow down the nervous system of my Prey, weaken its muscles, render it unconscious.
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text:
角を曲がった時、私は獲物を行き止まりに追い込んだことに気づいた。大虐殺の始まりだ！
狩りの報酬として嘆願者から受け取った毒は、結晶の弾丸に詰められており、そろそろ効き始めていてもおかしくない。獲物の神経系を鈍らせ、筋肉を弱らせ、意識を失わせるのだ。
languages.original_text:
As I turn the corner, I triumphantly realise that I have driven the Prey into a dead end. It is time for the massacre!
The poison I received from the Petitioner as payment for the hunt is contained in the crystalline projectiles and should have worked by now. It will slow down the nervous system of my Prey, weaken its muscles, and render it unconscious.

traits.locale_text:
角を曲がった時、私は獲物を行き止まりに追い込んだことに気づいた。大虐殺の始まりだ！
狩りの報酬として嘆願者から受け取った毒は、結晶の弾丸に詰められており、そろそろ効き始めていてもおかしくない。獲物の神経系を鈍らせ、筋肉を弱らせ、意識を失わせるのだ。
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text:
当我转过拐角的时候，我骄傲地意识到，我已经将猎物逼到了死胡同。屠杀开始了！
委托人给了我特制毒药作为这场狩猎的报酬，而我早已将毒药涂在了水晶弹丸上，现在应该差不多起作用了。这种毒药会阻塞猎物的神经系统，削弱肌肉的力量，让它慢慢失去知觉。
languages.original_text:
As I turn the corner, I triumphantly realise that I have driven the Prey into a dead end. It is time for the massacre!
The poison I received from the Petitioner as payment for the hunt is contained in the crystalline projectiles and should have worked by now. It will slow down the nervous system of my Prey, weaken its muscles, and render it unconscious.

traits.speaker: Player

languages.text:
Al doblar la esquina, me doy cuenta de que he llevado a la presa a un callejón sin salida. ¡Llegó la hora de la masacre!
El veneno que recibí de la solicitante como pago por la caza estaba inoculado en los proyectiles cristalinos y ya debería haber hecho efecto. Sirve para ralentizar el sistema nervioso de mi presa, debilitar sus músculos y dejarla inconsciente.
languages.original_text:
As I turn the corner, I triumphantly realise that I have driven the Prey into a dead end. It is time for the massacre!
The poison I received from the Petitioner as payment for the hunt is contained in the crystalline projectiles and should have worked by now. It will slow down the nervous system of my Prey, weaken its muscles, and render it unconscious.

traits.locale_text:

El veneno que recibí de la solicitante como pago por la caza estaba inoculado en los proyectiles cristalinos y ya debería haber hecho efecto. Tendría que ralentizar el sistema nervioso de mi presa, debilitar sus músculos y dejarla inconsciente.
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text:
Als ich um die Ecke biege, erkenne ich triumphierend, dass ich die Beute in eine Sackgasse getrieben habe. Es wird Zeit für das Massaker!
Das Gift, das ich von der Bittstellerin als Bezahlung für die Jagd erhielt, befand sich in den Kristallprojektilen und müsste inzwischen gewirkt haben. Es wird das Nervensystem meiner Beute verlangsamen, ihre Muskeln schwächen und sie bewusstlos machen.
languages.original_text:
As I turn the corner, I triumphantly realise that I have driven the Prey into a dead end. It is time for the massacre!
The poison I received from the Petitioner as payment for the hunt is contained in the crystalline projectiles and should have worked by now. It will slow down the nervous system of my Prey, weaken its muscles, and render it unconscious.

traits.locale_text:

traits.speaker: Player

languages.text:
Au détour d'un virage, je me rends compte que j'ai attiré ma proie dans une impasse. L'heure du massacre est venue !
Le poison reçu en paiement de la requérante et dont j'avais imprégné mes projectiles avant la traque devrait désormais faire effet : ma proie sentira son système nerveux ralentir et ses muscles faiblir avant de sombrer dans l'inconscience.
languages.original_text:
As I turn the corner, I triumphantly realise that I have driven the Prey into a dead end. It is time for the massacre!
The poison I received from the Petitioner as payment for the hunt is contained in the crystalline projectiles and should have worked by now. It will slow down the nervous system of my Prey, weaken its muscles, and render it unconscious.

traits.speaker: Player

languages.text:
Köşeyi döndüğümde Avımı köşeye sıkıştırıp hedefime ulaştığımı anlıyorum. Sırada katliam var!
Müracaatçı'dan avın ödemesi olarak aldığım zehri kristal mermilere işlemiştim. Şimdiye dek tesir etmiş olmalı. Zehir; Avımın sinir sistemini yavaşlatacak, kaslarını zayıflatacak ve bilincini yitirmesine neden olacak.
languages.original_text:
As I turn the corner, I triumphantly realise that I have driven the Prey into a dead end. It is time for the massacre!
The poison I received from the Petitioner as payment for the hunt is contained in the crystalline projectiles and should have worked by now. It will slow down the nervous system of my Prey, weaken its muscles, and render it unconscious.

traits.locale_text:
Köşeyi döndüğümde, Av'ı köşeye sıkıştırdığımı ve zaferi kazandığımı anlıyorum. Sırada katliam var!
Müracaatçı'dan avın ödemesi olarak aldığım zehir, kristal atışlara işlenmiş durumda ve şimdiye dek tesir etmiş olmalı. Av'ımın sinir sistemini yavaşlatacak, kaslarını zayıflatacak ve bilincini yitirmesine neden olacak.
traits.speaker: Player
